amendment.description: Amendment requires that land owners adjacent to National Forest system lands receive advance notice in writing whenever the Forest Service sets a prescribed burn.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-52 to require advance notice, in writing, to adjacent landowners whenever the Department of Agriculture sets a prescribed fire on National Forest System land.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 0 (Roll no. 158).
